name.description: The name of the data in this texture data slot. Common examples could be `normals`, `specularColor`, or `albedo

fileSuffix.description: The suffix for the texture that holds this texture data. This can be the empty string , `_s`, `_n`, or anything else you want to use

channels.description: Tells Nova which channels of your texture this data is in

items.description: The channels of the texture to pull from. For example, if the `channels` array is ["R", "G"] then this texture data will be taken from the red and green channels and will be used as a two-channel texture
